recipesJson.name: mlNikon's Pink Cake
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: I chose WF Princess Cake as the main note here because it has a delightful fruity cake note and used a touch of FA Forest Fruit to deepen the berry note. Norwegian Ring Cake is used to supplement the cake note and give it a darker richer crust. Cap Vanilla Cupcake and Cap Vanilla Whipped Cream is used for the frosting of the cake.
